name: Paradise Eden
description:
Welcome to Paradise Eden!

A gothic-fantasy, anime-style visual novel filled with much to do!

You wake up in a mysterious manor with no memories. Feeling called towards a single room, you are introduced to a girls who's manner of appearance is quite dark. However, others are also inside the manor. Your goal is to uncover the mysteries of the manor, find the reason why everyone has been summoned there, and figure out who you really are.

THIS GAME IS UNDERGOING CONTINUOUS DEVELOPMENT

Content WILL Include:

  • 17 girls to interact with
  • A deep storyline with a planned 30+ hours of content
  • Different chats depending on romantic relationships
  • Lots of different character quests and events
  • In game secrets that can be solved to unlock special parts of the game
  • Puzzles and mysteries
  • Beautiful music

And more to be discovered! Again, this game is undergoing continuous development. If you enjoy my game, I encourage you to leave a simple review. If you wish to support me, here is my patreon. https://www.patreon.com/silasxiii

NOTE: As I update the game, each chapter will include 3 more girls to discover, adding to the story, and updating chats and character quests. With 2000 lines of code in Chapter One, Chapter Two will double that, continuing with each chapter adding a lot more story and creating quite the lengthy game.
